product_name: BELUGA Nylon Cockpit Cover - Special Buy
long_description: Use the BELUGA Nylon Cockpit Cover to keep debris out of the cockpit and help protect it from the weather. Polyurethane-coated BELUGA Nylon Cockpit Cover features an adjustable shockcord to snugly fit cockpit coaming. Safety hook and front grab loop. Special buy.
short_description: Use the BELUGA Nylon Cockpit Cover to keep debris out of the cockpit and help protect it from the weather.
